attributes.action: address the International Olympic Committee to put forward the case for making the noble sport of fruit cricket an olympic sport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fruit cricket is a game played by sportsmen of numerous countries across the globe. If it were to be made an olympic sport it would encourage even greater participation and would help to combat growing levels of obesity.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
